title: Executioner

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Executioners** are terrifying [tier-1 demons](/Tier-1_demon "Tier-1 demon") that move at twice normal speed. Against poorly armoured characters, they can deal huge amounts of damage very quickly, especially since they usually [haste](/Haste "Haste") themselves at the start of a fight.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                         |                                                      |
| :---------- | ----------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Haste](/Haste "Haste") | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Spellcasters should kill executioners at range or escape as quickly as possible, as anything with low [AC](/AC "AC") will be torn to shreds in melee. They can't fly, so hiding behind [deep water](/Deep_water "Deep water") or [lava](/Lava "Lava") will thwart them.
- Characters with high AC and [GDR](/GDR "GDR") can engage them in melee with reasonable safety, as their individual attacks aren't too bad.
- They are somewhat resistant to all elements, so use physical attacks, [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath"), or irresistible attacks against them.

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), executioners could cast [Pain](/Pain "Pain").

Executioner 1 
HP 43-88
HD 12
XP 1544
Speed 20
AC 10
EV 15
Will 140
Attack1 30 (hit: plain)
Attack2 10 (hit: plain)
Attack3 10 (hit: plain)
Resistances rF+
rC+
rElec
rPois+
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Demonic
Size Large
Type Executioner, Executioner
Flags Fighter

See invisible
A horribly powerful and swift demon, its shape obscured by a cloud of swirling scythe-like blades.


Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Executioners are terrifying tier-1 demons that move at twice normal speed. Against poorly armoured characters, they can deal huge amounts of damage very quickly, especially since they usually haste themselves at the start of a fight.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Haste Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Spellcasters should kill executioners at range or escape as quickly as possible, as anything with low AC will be torn to shreds in melee. They can't fly, so hiding behind deep water or lava will thwart them.
  • Characters with high AC and GDR can engage them in melee with reasonable safety, as their individual attacks aren't too bad.
  • They are somewhat resistant to all elements, so use physical attacks, holy wrath, or irresistible attacks against them.

History

  • Prior to 0.27, executioners could cast Pain.

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{monster info}}


==Useful Info==
'''Executioners''' are terrifying [[tier-1 demon]]s that move at twice normal speed. Against poorly armoured characters, they can deal huge amounts of damage very quickly, especially since they usually [[haste]] themselves at the start of a fight.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Spellcasters should kill executioners at range or escape as quickly as possible, as anything with low [[AC]] will be torn to shreds in melee. They can't fly, so hiding behind [[deep water]] or [[lava]] will thwart them.
*Characters with high AC and [[GDR]] can engage them in melee with reasonable safety, as their individual attacks aren't too bad.
*They are somewhat resistant to all elements, so use physical attacks, [[holy wrath]], or irresistible attacks against them.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], executioners could cast [[Pain]].
[[Category:Demon]]
